item.title: 卡洛斯-斯利姆悄然成为墨西哥石油公司最后的合作伙伴
item.description: 从墨西哥首富到墨西哥最重要的石油大亨，卡洛斯-斯利姆的转变来得缓慢而微妙。卡洛斯-斯利姆在塔洛斯能源公司（Talos Energy Inc.2023 年，卡洛斯-斯利姆以 5.3 亿美元从一位亿万富翁手中买下了两处油田资产。之后又计划斥资 12 亿美元开发墨西哥湾的一个天然气矿床。【原文：The transformation of Mexico’s richest person into its most important oil baron came about slowly, almost subtly. Carlos Slim built up a stake in Talos Energy Inc. before flipping it for the company’s Mexican unit. There was a 2023 deal for $530 million to buy a pair of oilfield assets from a fellow billionaire. Then a $1.2 billion plan to develop a gas deposit in the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 据称马来西亚国家石油公司将探索出售价值 70 亿美元的加拿大业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd）正在考虑其加拿大公司（前身为 Progress Energy Resources Corp.【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd. is considering options for its Canadian company formerly known as Progress Energy Resources Corp., including a sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚债券拍卖吸引六年来最弱需求
item.description: 澳大利亚 12 年期国债的拍卖吸引了约六年来最微弱的需求，因为国内企业发行量增加，而且澳大利亚国债在一段时间内表现出色。【原文：An auction of 12-year Australian government bonds drew the weakest demand in about six years amid higher domestic corporate issuances and a period of outperformance.】

item.title: 大宗交易推动印度股票交易额创七个月新高
item.description: 一连串的大宗交易将印度的股票现货交易价值推升至近七个月来的新高。【原文：A spate of block trades has pushed India’s cash equity trading value to a nearly seven-month high.】

item.title: 英国养老金 "巨型基金 "能否促进经济发展？
item.description: 投资水平低是英国十多年来经济增长乏力的原因之一。那么，还有什么比将更多的养老金储蓄用于生产性投资更明智的呢？【原文：Low investment levels are one reason why the UK has endured more than a decade of subpar economic growth. So what could be more sensible than to divert more of the country’s pension savings into productive investments?】

item.title: 看好新世界的赌注创下纪录，因为它乐观地认为不会违约
item.description: 周二，对新世界发展有限公司的看涨期权押注飙升至峰值，分析师估计，尽管债务问题持续存在，但该公司发生违约的可能性很低，因此股价反弹。【原文：Bullish options bets on New World Development Co. surged to a peak on Tuesday, as the stock rebounded with analysts estimating the chances of a default are low despite the constant debt concerns.】

item.title: 俄罗斯报告乌克兰被占地区发生重大电力故障
item.description: 俄罗斯官员说，在其部分占领的两个乌克兰地区，由于能源基础设施遭到破坏，70 多万户家庭断电。【原文：Russian officials said more than 700,000 households were without electricity in two Ukrainian regions it partially occupies, following damage to energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 斯洛文尼亚重启新任央行行长遴选程序
item.description: 领导斯洛文尼亚中央银行的最新候选人本周将努力争取该国执政党的支持，以填补已空缺近五个月的职位。【原文：The latest candidate to lead Slovenia’s central bank will try to win over the country’s ruling parties this week in a bid to fill a role that’s been vacant for almost five months.】

item.title: 桥水以 21% 回报率的亚洲战略发掘中国富豪
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收全球关税后，亚洲决策者希望刺激当地经济，因此桥水联合基金（Bridgewater Associates）计划募集一只亚洲战略基金，以吸引寻求海外资产投资的中国富裕投资者。【原文：Bridgewater Associates is tapping rich Chinese investors seeking exposure to overseas assets, with plans to raise an Asia-strategy fund as the region’s policymakers look to stimulate local economies following President Donald Trump’s global tariffs.】

item.title: 土耳其五月份年度通货膨胀率降至 35.4
item.description: 土耳其 5 月份的年度通胀率降至 2021 年 11 月以来的最低点，这可能为即将恢复降息和提振企业铺平了道路。【原文：Turkey’s annual inflation eased in May to the lowest since November 2021, potentially paving the way for an imminent resumption of interest-rate cuts and a boost to businesses.】

item.title: 经合组织称里夫斯的 "薄财政缓冲 "给英国经济带来风险
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）表示，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）不在其财政规则范围内给予政府更多的操作空间，英国经济将面临 "重大下行风险"。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will expose the economy to “significant downside risk” if she does not give the government more room to maneuver within her fiscal rules, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令美国和全球经济陷入放缓
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）表示，唐纳德-特朗普好斗的贸易政策已使世界经济陷入不确定性加剧的低迷状态，而美国是受影响最严重的国家之一。【原文：Donald Trump’s combative trade policies have tipped the world economy into a downturn clouded in heightened uncertainty, with the US among the hardest hit, the OECD said.】

item.title: 摩根大通称莱茵金属将取代开灵跻身欧洲斯托克 50 指数
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司（Rheinmetall AG）不断飙升的股价为这家坦克和弹药制造商在欧元区主要股票基准中赢得了一席之地。【原文：Rheinmetall AG’s surging stock price has earned the tank and munitions maker a place in the euro area’s main stock benchmark.】

item.title: 美国向亚洲销售农作物的努力在越南结出硕果
item.description: 越南承诺购买更多美国商品，以加强与华盛顿的贸易关系。【原文：US efforts to increase exports of agricultural products to Asia, excluding China, look to be bearing fruit, with Vietnam pledging to buy more American goods to strengthen trade ties with Washington.】

item.title: MJ Gleeson 下调英国经济复苏缓慢及规划障碍展望
item.description: MJ Gleeson Plc 下调了指导目标，理由是英国住房市场复苏缓慢以及规划延误。【原文：MJ Gleeson Plc slashed guidance, citing a slow housing market recovery in the UK and planning delays.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率四年来首次转为负值
item.description: 瑞士的通货膨胀率自 2021 年初以来首次转为负值，这增加了决策者在本月晚些时候降低借贷成本的压力。【原文：The inflation rate in Switzerland turned negative for the first time since early 2021, adding to pressure on policymakers to lower borrowing costs cut later this month.】

item.title: 英国水务局将在监管改革中发挥监督作用
item.description: 英国水务监管机构需要发挥更多类似于银行业的监督作用，以帮助遏制该行业几十年来最严重的危机。【原文：The UK water regulator needs to take a more supervisory role akin to the banking sector in order to help stem the industry’s worst crisis in decades.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司的首选投标人 KKR 退出救援交易
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司的首选竞标者 KKR & Co.公司退出了救援交易，这对该公司来说是一个重大挫折。【原文：Thames Water’s preferred bidder KKR & Co. has pulled out of a rescue deal in a major setback for the utility.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将走高，英镑下滑
台积电在与特朗普进行 "热烈 "会谈后将日本延误归咎于交通问题
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司首席执行官魏幸耘（C. C. Wei）将交通堵塞的恶化归咎于该公司在日本西南部基地扩建工程的轻微延误，这凸显了东京标志性芯片制造项目的一些障碍。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. Chief Executive Officer C. C. Wei blamed worsening traffic snarls for slight delays in expanding its base in southwest Japan, highlighting some of the snags in Tokyo’s signature chipmaking project.】

item.title: 卡塔尔支持的卡萨达公司瞄准北非首笔酒店交易
item.description: 由卡塔尔 5 240 亿美元主权财富基金支持的私募股权公司卡萨达资本管理公司（Kasada Capital Management）预计将于 2026 年上半年在摩洛哥达成一项酒店交易，这标志着该公司将进军北非蓬勃发展的酒店和旅游业。【原文：Kasada Capital Management, a private equity firm backed by Qatar’s $524 billion sovereign wealth fund, expects to strike a hotel deal in Morocco in the first half of 2026, marking its entry into North Africa’s booming hospitality and tourism industry.】

item.title: Klarna 首席执行官在平价资本股份销售中吸引瑞典精英
item.description: Flat Capital AB 是 Klarna 联合创始人塞巴斯蒂安-西米亚特考夫斯基（Sebastian Siemiatkowski）及其妻子妮娜-西米亚特考夫斯基（Nina Siemiatkowski）的投资公司，该公司通过供股扩大了股东基础，其中包括一些瑞典最著名的商业家族。【原文：Flat Capital AB, the investment firm of Klarna co-founder Sebastian Siemiatkowski and his wife Nina Siemiatkowski, has broadened its shareholder base via a rights issue that included some of Sweden’s most prominent business families.】

item.title: Prosus 首席投资官 Ervin Tu 将卸任
item.description: Prosus NV 集团总裁兼首席投资官 Ervin Tu 在公司网站上发表声明称，他将辞去目前的职务。【原文：Prosus NV Group President and Chief Investment Officer Ervin Tu will step down from his current role, according to a statement on the company’s website.】

item.title: 印度削减进口税后，棕榈油因需求前景看好而跳涨
item.description: 棕榈油攀升至近三周来的最高水平，原因是在头号买家印度下调进口关税后，市场预期需求会增加。【原文：Palm oil climbed to the highest level in almost three weeks on expectations for higher demand after top buyer India cut import duties.】

item.title: 大部分阿达尼股票因美国调查伊朗货运的报道而下跌
item.description: 华尔街日报》报道称，美国检察官正在调查这家印度企业集团可能与受制裁影响的伊朗进行的交易，随后阿达尼集团旗下大部分公司的股价周二下跌。【原文：Most Adani Group units’ shares fell Tuesday following a report by The Wall Street Journal that said US prosecutors are probing the Indian conglomerate’s possible dealings with sanctions-hit Iran.】

item.title: 人工智能先驱成立研究小组，帮助打造更安全的代理商
item.description: 人工智能先驱本吉奥（Yoshua Bengio）正在创建一个新的非营利性研究组织，以促进以另一种方式开发尖端的人工智能系统，从而降低该技术的潜在风险。这家名为 "LawZero "的非营利组织将于本周二成立，谷歌前首席执行官埃里克-施密特（Eric Schmidt）的一个慈善组织和 Skype 联合创始人贾安-塔林（Jaan Tallinn）等将为其提供 3000 万美元的支持。本吉奥将领导一个由超过 1【原文：Yoshua Bengio, an artificial intelligence pioneer, is creating a new nonprofit research organization to promote an alternative approach to developing cutting-edge AI systems, with the aim of mitigating the technology’s potential risks. The nonprofit, called LawZero, is set to launch Tuesday with $30 million in backing from one of former Google Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt’s philanthropic organizations and Skype co-founder Jaan Tallinn, among others. Bengio will lead a team of more than 1】

item.title: 瑞典钢铁制造商阿莱马将定价视为对抗美国关税的手段
item.description: 瑞典钢铁制造商 Alleima AB 的首席执行官表示，该公司不会承担关税带来的任何潜在成本，而是会集中精力提高价格，并瞄准特定行业。【原文：The chief executive officer of Swedish steelmaker Alleima AB says the company will not absorb any potential costs from tariffs and will instead focus its efforts on raising prices, as well as targeting specific industries.】

item.title: 日本央行上田暗示有可能继续削减债券购买规模
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫暗示，随着董事会决定购买国债的日期临近，央行可能在下一财年继续放慢购买国债的步伐。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda hinted that the central bank could continue to slow the pace of government bond purchases next fiscal year, as the board’s decision over bond buying approaches.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券销售创 14 个月来最高需求量
item.description: 由于较高的收益率吸引了投资者，日本 10 年期国债拍卖需求升至 2024 年 4 月以来最强劲的水平，在全球利率不断上升的背景下，这有助于安抚市场。【原文：Demand at Japan’s 10-year debt auction rose to the strongest since April 2024 as higher yields attracted investors, helping to soothe the market against a backdrop of rising rates globally.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长亨特认为美国关税拖累澳大利亚经济增长和就业
item.description: 据一位高级官员称，澳大利亚央行预计全球贸易的不确定性将拖累国内经济和就业，这有助于解释决策者上个月出人意料地转向鸽派立场的原因。【原文：Australia’s central bank expects global trade uncertainty will weigh on the domestic economy and employment, according to a senior official, helping explain policymakers’ surprise switch to a dovish stance last month.】
